item.title: Explaining Segregated Witness
item.description: Aaron: 00:01:46 Live from Utrecht. This is The Van Wirdum Sjorsnado. Hello. Sjors, we’re going to talk about a classic today. Sjors: 00:01:52 Yeah. We’re going to party like it’s 2015. Aaron: 00:01:55 SegWit. Segregated Witness Sjors: 00:01:56 That’s right. Aaron: 00:01:57 Segregated Witness, which was the previous soft fork, well, was the last soft fork. We’re working towards a Taproot soft fork now. Sjors: 00:02:06 It’s the last soft fork we know of.
